# Eli's Immersive Navigation

Tired of relying on the ugly f3 menu to know where you are? Worry not! This mod hides f3 coordinates in survival (configurable), and adds some new tools that help you navigate.

### The tools:
- **Barometer**: Tells you how many meters above or below sea level you are.
- **Sextant**: Gives you impercise realistic style coordinates when you have access to the sky. (Precision is configurable)
- **Compass**: The vanilla compass, modified to always point north.

When you have either tool in your inventory there is an additional hud element showing their readings at all time.

Now you can build in-world landmarks to help you navigate, aswell as get properly lost!
